/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun casts a bright light, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars, buses, and trucks, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The buildings in the background are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life and urban landscape of Beijing.
